post:
Recently lost 2 VPS due to deadpool, need to fill them in.

Got too many in U.S. already.

I need 2 VPS in 2 different countries, which are not the U.S.

OpenVZ preferred.

Specs:
128/192 ram/burst
5 gigs disk

They will be used to host Wordpress sites.
